name: E-Librarian
description:
This E-Librarian AI Agent is a digital librarian designed to help users locate and access ebooks.

It searches digital archives and provides detailed results for each title, including the author, publication year, a brief synopsis, a direct link, and a cover image.
To ensure comprehensive results, the agent supplements its archive searches with Google Search for more obscure information or to answer general book-related questions.
It also provides guidance on potential access issues, such as suggesting a VPN for region-restricted content.

To expand this agent's capabilities, users are invited to integrate additional ebook search tools or recommendation engines.
author: @official.shinkai
